definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
just recently/just a moment ago/just now

sentences.chinese: 這些勞累的孩子直到7點纔回家。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在喫魚的時候，纔可以用手去捏魚骨頭。
我們的電子服務纔是關鍵。

sentences.english: This is where the future will be won.
sentences.chinese: 這纔是我們贏得未來的基礎。

sentences.english: What should you do then on those sleepless nights?
sentences.chinese: 那麼你在睡不着的夜晚幹什麼纔好呢？

sentences.english: That is the entire stalker problem right there.
sentences.chinese: 這纔是整個跟蹤狂問題的癥結所在。

sentences.english: All sounds are still only moments, the mood will be cheerful jump.
sentences.chinese: 只有萬籟俱靜的時刻，心緒纔會歡快的跳躍。

sentences.english: But people are always coming late to operas .
sentences.chinese: 不過人們總是很遲纔來看歌劇。

sentences.english: If your dream is to destroy the world, that is the great evil.
sentences.chinese: 而如果你的理想是毀滅世界，那纔是大惡。

sentences.english: Only humping yourself can you hope to finish your work in time.
sentences.chinese: 只有加把勁幹，你纔有希望按時完成任務。

sentences.english: This thing is supposed to be a whole number here.
Always get along long before he discovered the great wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 總是相處很久纔會發現他的大智慧。

sentences.english: We shouldn't wait for relatives to come to our door before we take care of them.
sentences.chinese: 若論親戚之間，原該不等上門來就該有照應纔是。

sentences.english: I knew that I am a genuine double-dealer.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，我纔是一個真正的兩面派。
但是科技，也許纔是不朽。

sentences.english: We climbed to the top after an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我們爬了一個多小時纔到達山頂。

definition: to realize suddenly/to wake up with a start
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
